sn3.21:1.2: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho rajanam pasenadim kosalam bhagava etadavoca:
sn3.21:2.2: Idha, maharaja, ekacco puggalo nice kule paccajato hoti, candalakule va venakule va nesadakule va rathakarakule va pukkusakule va dalidde appannapanabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha kasirena ghasacchado labbhati.
sn3.21:2.3: So ca hoti dubbanno duddasiko okotimako bavhabadho kano va kuni va khanjo va pakkhahato va, na labhi annassa panassa vatthassa yanassa malagandhavilepanassa seyyavasathapadipeyyassa.
sn3.21:2.4: So kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati.
sn3.21:2.5: So kayena duccaritam caritva vacaya duccaritam caritva manasa duccaritam caritva, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
sn3.21:3.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso andhakara va andhakaram gaccheyya, tama va tamam gaccheyya, lohitamala va lohitamalam gaccheyya.
sn3.21:3.3: Evam kho, maharaja, puggalo tamotamaparayano hoti.
sn3.21:4.2: Idha, maharaja, ekacco puggalo nice kule paccajato hoti, candalakule va venakule va nesadakule va rathakarakule va pukkusakule va dalidde appannapanabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha kasirena ghasacchado labbhati.
sn3.21:4.3: So ca kho hoti dubbanno duddasiko okotimako bavhabadho, kano va kuni va khanjo va pakkhahato va, na labhi annassa panassa vatthassa yanassa malagandhavilepanassa seyyavasathapadipeyyassa.
sn3.21:4.4: So kayena sucaritam carati, vacaya sucaritam carati, manasa sucaritam carati.
sn3.21:4.5: So kayena sucaritam caritva vacaya sucaritam caritva manasa sucaritam caritva, kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
sn3.21:5.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso pathaviya va pallankam aroheyya, pallanka va assapitthim aroheyya, assapitthiya va hatthikkhandham aroheyya, hatthikkhandha va pasadam aroheyya.
sn3.21:5.3: Evam kho, maharaja, puggalo tamojotiparayano hoti.
sn3.21:6.2: Idha, maharaja, ekacco puggalo ucce kule paccajato hoti, khattiyamahasalakule va brahmanamahasalakule va gahapatimahasalakule va, addhe mahaddhane mahabhoge pahutajataruparajate pahutavittupakarane pahutadhanadhanne.
sn3.21:6.3: So ca hoti abhirupo dassaniyo pasadiko, paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagato, labhi annassa panassa vatthassa yanassa malagandhavilepanassa seyyavasathapadipeyyassa.
sn3.21:6.4: So kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati.
sn3.21:6.5: So kayena duccaritam caritva vacaya duccaritam caritva manasa duccaritam caritva, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
sn3.21:7.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso pasada va hatthikkhandham oroheyya, hatthikkhandha va assapitthim oroheyya, assapitthiya va pallankam oroheyya, pallanka va pathavim oroheyya, pathaviya va andhakaram paviseyya.
sn3.21:7.3: Evam kho, maharaja, puggalo jotitamaparayano hoti.
sn3.21:8.2: Idha, maharaja, ekacco puggalo ucce kule paccajato hoti, khattiyamahasalakule va brahmanamahasalakule va gahapatimahasalakule va, addhe mahaddhane mahabhoge pahutajataruparajate pahutavittupakarane pahutadhanadhanne.
sn3.21:8.3: So ca hoti abhirupo dassaniyo pasadiko, paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagato, labhi annassa panassa vatthassa yanassa malagandhavilepanassa seyyavasathapadipeyyassa.
sn3.21:8.4: So kayena sucaritam carati, vacaya sucaritam carati, manasa sucaritam carati.
sn3.21:8.5: So kayena sucaritam caritva vacaya sucaritam caritva manasa sucaritam caritva, kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
sn3.21:9.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso pallanka va pallankam sankameyya, assapitthiya va assapitthim sankameyya, hatthikkhandha va hatthikkhandham sankameyya, pasada va pasadam sankameyya.
sn3.21:9.3: Evam kho, maharaja, puggalo jotijotiparayano hoti.
sn3.21:9.4: Ime kho, maharaja, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
